long_desc.thetext: The QooxDoo documentation says qx.ui.container.Stack.setSelection is deprecated, and to use qx.ui.container.Stack.setSelections. But the latter method does not actually exist. (Looks like the mixin is missing from Stack.js.)

Thank you for the report, could you pleas tell us the URL from the documentation.
I think you mean "qx.ui.container.Stack.setSelected" is deprecated?
The documentations for 0.8.2 shouldn't have any information that this method is deprecated, because this methods is deprecated with the upcoming 0.8.3 release.

Correct, I meant "setSelected".
The docs here
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/apiviewer/#qx.ui.container.Stack
say it's deprecated, and recommend setSelections instead.

OK, I see I was using the devel docs instead of current. Perhaps this is just user error on my part... Sorry.
I think it would be good to put DEVELOPMENT in big letters at the top of the devel docs, though, for clarity. :)

The devel API Viewer shows the new Selection API, that is OK.
The version from the API Viewer is shown on the top right. "qooxdoo 0.8.2" for the current release or "qooxdoo 0.8.3-pre" for the devel version. I know this is not flashy, so if you think a more flashy information is needed (like described in your comment #4), please open a new bug report as enhancement.
Thanks, Chris
